    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableFoods

        public java.util.List<Food> getAvailableFoods(Person person)
        Get all foods to which a person is not yet allergic.
        Parameters:
        person - the person for which foods are searched.
        Returns:
        a List containing all foods entities except the ones to which the person is already allergic.

      • getAvailableFoods

        public java.util.List<Food> getAvailableFoods(Dish dish)
        Get all foods that are not yet used as ingredients for the provided dish.
        Parameters:
        dish - the dish for which foods are searched.
        Returns:
        a List containing all available food entities.
